sentences.en: A Credit may be either revocable or irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 信用证可以是可撤销的或可撤销的.

sentences.en: Any payments are discretionary, non - binding and revocable for future years.
sentences.cn: 所有支付均为酌情支付, 无附加条件且将来几年可撤销.

sentences.en: First it is revocable at any time, and it is his son and his chief financial officer who are running it.
sentences.cn: 首先它是随时可撤销的，而且运营者是他的儿子和他的首席财务官。

sentences.en: If a credit is opened without the word " irrevocable ", it can be considered revocable.
sentences.cn: 凡证上未注明 “ 不可撤消 ” 字样的, 都被认为是可以撤消的信用证.

sentences.en: If one is well behaved and has made great contributions to company as well within one year, the demerit recording can be revocable;
sentences.cn: 一年内表现良好且为公司作出重大贡献的可撤销一次记过。

sentences.en: If there is no warning for one within half an year, the punishment of warning can be revocable;
sentences.cn: 半年内无再犯警告处罚，表现良好的员工可撤销其警告处分。

sentences.en: In the absence of such indication, the CredIt'shall be deemed revocable.
sentences.cn: 如无该项表示, 信用证应视为可以撤消的.

sentences.en: It was a privilege revocable at any time on whim of the authorities.
sentences.cn: 这种恩赐只要当权者随时可以取消.

sentences.en: The Credit, therefore, should clearly indicate whether it is revocable or irrevocable.
sentences.cn: 因此信用证上应明确注明是可撤销的或是不可撤销的.

sentences.en: This letter of credit is essentially a disguised form of revocable letter of credit.
sentences.cn: 这种信用证实质上是变相的可撤销的信用证.

sentences.en: We confirm that it is opened as revocable documentary.
sentences.cn: 我行证实,此证是可撤销的.

trans.tran_en: capable of being revoked; able to be cancelled
